SEARCH

Class PoissonDistribution

java.lang.Object
PoissonDistribution
public class PoissonDistribution extends Object
The PoissonDistribution class contains methods relating to Poisson Probability Distributions, including the probability, lambda and standard deviation.

  • Method Details

    • poissonDistribution

      public double poissonDistribution(int n, int k, int scalar, int y)
      The poissonDistribution method calculates the probability of an event happening based on a Poisson Probability Distribution
      Parameters:
      n - The number of units
      k - The total number of events
      scalar - Scalar value for lambda
      y - The number of events that occur
      Returns:
      The probability of the event occurring

    • poissonDistribution

      public double poissonDistribution(double lambda, int y)
      The poissonDistribution method calculates the probability of an event happening based on a Poisson Probability Distribution
      Parameters:
      lambda - The mean or variance of the Poisson Distribution
      y - The number of events that occur
      Returns:
      The probability of the event occurring

    • poissonDistribution

    • poissonDistribution

      lambda - The mean or variance of the Poisson Distribution
      y - The number of events that occur
      Returns:
      The probability of the event occurring

    • lambda

      public double lambda(int n, int k, int scalar)
      The lambda method finds the value of lambda for a Poisson distribution. Lambda is equal to the mean and variance of the distribution, so this method can be used to find either.
      Parameters:
      n - The number of units
      k - The total number of events
      scalar - Scalar value for lambda
      Returns:
      The value of lambda

    • lambda

      public BigDecimal lambda(BigInteger n, BigInteger k, BigInteger scalar)
      The lambda method finds the value of lambda for a Poisson distribution. Lambda is equal to the mean and variance of the distribution, so this method can be used to find either.
      Parameters:
      n - The number of units
      k - The Total number of events
      scalar - Scalar value for lambda
      Returns:
      The value of lambda

    • standardDeviation

      public double standardDeviation(double lambda)
      The standardDeviation method finds the standard deviation of a Poisson Distribution.
      Parameters:
      lambda - The mean or variance of the distribution
      Returns:
      The standard deviation of the distribution

    • standardDeviation

      public BigDecimal standardDeviation(BigDecimal lambda)
      The standardDeviation method finds the standard deviation of a Poisson Distribution.
      Parameters:
      lambda - The mean or variance of the distribution
      Returns:
      The standard deviation of the distribution
